news.title: Karnataka pollution control board to connect surplus STP water with construction needs
news.para: Effective management of treated sewage is crucial, as the usage of fresh water is banned by both the Government of India and the Government of Karnataka, highlighting the importance of this initiative.

news.title: Illegal establishments up; authorities pass the buck in Pune
news.para: The Porsche Taycan crash in Kalyaninagar has brought attention to the rampant illegal commercial activities in Pune's residential areas, highlighted by citizens and Team Swachh Kalyaninagar.

news.title: 360 ONE's founder buys two apartments in Mumbai's Worli for Rs 170 crore
news.para: Bhagat founded 360 ONE, formerly known as IIFL Wealth & Asset Management, along with his colleagues in 2008. The firm is currently among India's largest asset and wealth management firms with more than $56.3 billion assets under management.

news.title: Noida authority submits report on cancellation of two commercial plot allotments
news.para: On May 10, the state govt cancelled the allotments to Lavish Buildmart and Skyline Propcon, subsidiaries of the Gurgaon-based real estate company M3M, following a complaint that the realtors who were allotted the land were not eligible.

news.title: Average housing prices across top eight cities up 10% in Q1 2024: Report
news.para: Unsold inventory at an India level witnessed a marginal 3% year-on-year increase. Notably, Pune led with a significant 10% year-on-year drop in unsold inventory.

news.title: Strata aims to raise Rs 2,000 crore in FY25 under SM REITs
news.para: Strata will initiate the migration of its eligible assets to SM REITs, as it aims to achieve a total assets under managemet (AUM) of Rs 2,000 crore by the end of FY25.

news.title: GCCA India re-elects Parth Jindal as chair & Deepak Khetrapal as co-chair for 2024-2026
news.para: GCCA India in collaboration with the Energy and Resources Institute (TERI), is in the process of developing the net zero CO2 roadmap for the Indian cement industry and its value chain.

news.title: JSW Paints aims to achieve Rs 5,000 crore revenue by FY26
news.para: JSW Paints' gross revenue crossed the targeted Rs 2,000 crore. It aims to achieve Rs 5,000 crore revenue within the next two years (i.e. by FY26).

news.title: Century Real Estate targets sales of Rs 2,100 crore in FY25
news.para: Century Real Estate has achieved 121% growth in residential sales bookings compared to its previous fiscal year. With this jump, the company recorded Rs 1,022 crore of sales in the Bengaluru market alone.

news.title: Sweden's SBB sets up another joint venture with Castlelake to tackle debt
news.para: Under the deal, SBB and funds managed by Castlelake have signed a loan agreement of 5.7 billion Swedish crowns ($534.36 million).

news.title: Germany's Adler Group reaches restructuring agreement with its bondholders
news.para: The agreement also provides additional liquidity of up to 350 million euros, the German company said. As part of the agreement, the bondholders will hold 75% of total voting rights in the company.

news.title: UP-RERA expresses strong displeasure with Prayagraj development body for not giving possession
news.para: Sanjay Bhoosreddy, chairman, UP-RERA was hearing the cases of nine of the allottees of the Alaknanda project of PDA for enforcement of the orders passed in March 2023, noticed that the promoter had obtained the completion certificate in January 2024.

news.title: Monsoon nears, 480 wobbly buildings on Hyderabad civic body's radar
news.para: As part of the GHMC's monsoon preparedness drive, the civic body conducted a survey and identified 478 dilapidated buildings that are considered uninhabitable and pose a danger to their occupants and those in the surrounding areas.

news.title: Hindustan Construction Company's profit rises 22% to Rs 246 crore in Q4 FY24
news.para: Total income during the quarter under review stood at Rs 1,813.05 crore compared to Rs 2,437.23 crore a year ago. Total expenses declined to Rs 2,073.33 crore from 2,398.69 crore earlier.

news.title: Asian Granito India posts net loss of Rs 5.41 crore in Q4 FY24
news.para: Asian Granito India's net consolidated total income stood at Rs 428.06 crore in Q4 FY24, a dip of 6.70 per cent from Rs 458.81 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: Kolte-Patil Developers posts net loss of Rs 26.18 crore in Q4 FY24
news.para: Kolte-Patil Developers' net consolidated total income stood at Rs 527.71 crore in Q4 FY24, a dip of 34.40 per cent from Rs 804.42 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: Indiabulls Real Estate acquires Embassy Property Developments projects
news.para: Indiabulls Real Estate acquired Embassy Eden, a proposed residential villa development project spread over ~31.30 acre from EPDPL through the infusion of approximately Rs 465.71 crore capital in Sion Eden Developers.

news.title: Indiabulls Housing Finance's profit up 21% to Rs 319 crore in Q4 FY24
news.para: Its revenue from operations rose to Rs 2,205 crore for the March quarter as compared to Rs 2,075 crore in the year-ago period, Indiabulls Housing Finance said in a regulatory filing.

news.title: Awfis Space Solutions IPO subscribed 4.27 times on Day 2 of offer
news.para: The portion for Retail Individual Investors (RIIs) got subscribed 12.25 times, while the category for non-institutional investors fetched 6.81 times subscription. The quota for Qualified Institutional Buyers (QIBs) received 32 per cent subscription.

news.title: Starwood REIT to limit share redemptions as rate-cut bets ease
news.para: The fund had been selling its property investments to meet redemption demands, which have remained above the monthly and quarterly limits for the past year and a half, it said.
